actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 91 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 24.

Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S826-827, S828; text: CR S827) To decrease the Federal share of project costs under the airport improvement program for non-primary airports.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 91 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 40. Record Vote Number: 24.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Coburn.

purpose: To decrease the Federal share of project costs under the airport improvement program for non-primary airports.
